ygData.messageBody:
> I've been soloing the giant skels and drakes in Rathe Mtns using the
chains,
> fear, DDD combo. Works great as long as you dont lose track of your
timing.
> Im thinking of trying it on cyclops, just to see if I can.
>
> I've also been playing around with charm on the giant skels. (Never had
the
> guts to try it before now) After watching a bard charming HG's solo,
(first
> time I've ever seen this done) it inspired me to attempt it. I do,
however
> see one major problem with this: He is constantly training other people in
> the zone. Very not cool.
>

Hmm if he was "training" then they were attacking the giants chasing him. I
solo HGs a LOT and I've NEVER dumped a giant on a group. Your pet is doing
ungodly dmg to that giant it's attacking (80-100hp/shot) it's VERY pissed at
you when the charm drops. On top of that your PET is very pissed when charm
drops as well. As a result, unless somone ATTACKS one of the giants you're
working on you aren't going to "Train" anyone when doing this.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
